column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I guess I'm just not on the ramen bandwagon. I ordered the Jinya No3 "Cha Cha Cha" for garlic lovers. It just didn't wow me. It's not bad
column2: but I think I just prefer pho
column4: or banh canh over ramen noodles. There are obviously a lot of people who love this place
column5: but it just doesn't hit the spot for me. However
column6: my boyfriend chose the No1 Tonkatsu black and there was nothing left in his bowl
column7: and he finished my barely eaten bowl as well.
